fields.title: Grilled Chicken Caesar Salad
fields.description: Classic Caesar salad with grilled chicken breast, romaine lettuce, parmesan cheese, and homemade dressing.
fields.instructions:
1. Grill chicken breast with herbs and olive oil
2. Chop romaine lettuce
3. Make dressing with Greek yogurt, lemon, and garlic
4. Toss lettuce with dressing
5. Slice grilled chicken
6. Top with chicken, parmesan, and croutons

fields.title: Quinoa Buddha Bowl
fields.description: Colorful bowl with quinoa, roasted chickpeas, sweet potato, avocado, and tahini dressing.
fields.instructions:
1. Cook quinoa according to package
2. Roast chickpeas with spices
3. Roast diced sweet potato
4. Prepare tahini dressing
5. Arrange all ingredients in bowl
6. Drizzle with dressing and garnish

fields.title: Mediterranean Wrap
fields.description: Whole wheat wrap filled with hummus, falafel, fresh vegetables, and tzatziki sauce.
fields.instructions:
1. Warm whole wheat tortilla
2. Spread hummus evenly
3. Add falafel pieces
4. Layer with cucumber, tomato, and lettuce
5. Drizzle with tzatziki
6. Roll tightly and cut in half

fields.title: Tuna Avocado Salad
fields.description: Protein-rich salad with tuna, avocado, mixed greens, and a lemon vinaigrette.
fields.instructions:
1. Drain canned tuna
2. Mix tuna with diced avocado
3. Prepare mixed greens
4. Make lemon vinaigrette
5. Combine all ingredients
6. Top with cherry tomatoes and olives

fields.title: Lentil Vegetable Soup
fields.description: Hearty soup with red lentils, vegetables, and aromatic spices.  Perfect for meal prep.
fields.instructions:
1. Sauté onions, carrots, and celery
2. Add garlic and spices
3. Add lentils and vegetable broth
4. Add diced tomatoes
5. Simmer for 25-30 minutes
6. Garnish with fresh parsley

fields.title: Caprese Sandwich
fields.description: Italian-style sandwich with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, basil, and balsamic glaze on ciabatta.
fields.instructions:
1. Slice ciabatta bread
2. Layer fresh mozzarella slices
3. Add thick tomato slices
4. Add fresh basil leaves
5. Drizzle with balsamic glaze
6. Season with salt and pepper

fields.title: Asian Chicken Lettuce Wraps
fields.description: Light and flavorful ground chicken with water chestnuts wrapped in crisp lettuce leaves.
fields.instructions:
1. Cook ground chicken with ginger and garlic
2. Add diced water chestnuts and vegetables
3. Season with soy sauce and sesame oil
4. Prepare lettuce cups
5. Fill lettuce with chicken mixture
6. Top with green onions and sesame seeds

fields.title: Greek Salad with Grilled Shrimp
fields.description: Traditional Greek salad topped with marinated grilled shrimp and feta cheese.
fields.instructions:
1. Marinate shrimp in lemon and herbs
2. Grill shrimp until pink
3. Chop cucumber, tomatoes, and peppers
4. Add olives and red onion
5. Top with feta cheese
6. Dress with olive oil and oregano

fields.title: Turkey Club Sandwich
fields.description: Classic triple-decker sandwich with turkey, bacon, lettuce, tomato, and avocado.
fields.instructions:
1. Toast whole grain bread
2. Cook turkey bacon until crispy
3. Layer turkey slices on bread
4. Add bacon, lettuce, and tomato
5. Add avocado slices
6. Stack layers and secure with toothpicks

fields.title: Veggie Sushi Bowl
fields.description: Deconstructed sushi bowl with brown rice, edamame, cucumber, and avocado with ginger dressing.
fields.instructions:
1. Cook brown rice and season with rice vinegar
2. Cook edamame
3. Slice cucumber and avocado
4. Prepare ginger dressing
5. Arrange all ingredients in bowl
6. Top with sesame seeds and nori strips

fields.title: Black Bean Quesadilla
fields.description: Whole wheat quesadilla filled with black beans, cheese, peppers, and corn.
fields.instructions:
1. Mash black beans with spices
2. Sauté bell peppers and corn
3. Spread beans on tortilla
4. Add cheese and vegetables
5. Fold and cook until crispy
6. Serve with salsa and Greek yogurt

fields.title: Chicken Pesto Pasta Salad
fields.description: Cold pasta salad with grilled chicken, cherry tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil pesto.
fields.instructions:
1. Cook whole wheat pasta and cool
2. Grill and slice chicken
3. Make fresh basil pesto
4. Halve cherry tomatoes
5. Toss all ingredients with pesto
6. Add mozzarella balls and serve chilled

fields.title: Salmon Poke Bowl
fields.description: Hawaiian-inspired bowl with fresh salmon, rice, edamame, and sesame dressing.
fields.instructions:
1. Cook sushi rice
2. Cube fresh salmon
3. Marinate in soy sauce and sesame oil
4. Prepare vegetables
5. Arrange rice and toppings in bowl
6. Drizzle with spicy mayo

fields.title: Roasted Vegetable Panini
fields.description: Grilled panini with roasted vegetables, goat cheese, and balsamic reduction.
fields.instructions:
1. Roast zucchini, eggplant, and peppers
2. Spread goat cheese on bread
3. Layer roasted vegetables
4. Add arugula
5. Grill in panini press
6. Drizzle with balsamic reduction

fields.title: Cobb Salad
fields.description: Classic American salad with chicken, bacon, eggs, avocado, and blue cheese.
fields.instructions:
1. Grill and slice chicken
2. Cook and crumble bacon
3. Hard boil eggs and quarter
4. Arrange lettuce in bowl
5. Add all toppings in rows
6. Serve with ranch dressing

fields.title: Falafel Bowl
fields.description: Middle Eastern bowl with falafel, hummus, tabbouleh, and tahini sauce.
fields.instructions:
1.  Bake or fry falafel
2. Prepare tabbouleh salad
3. Arrange hummus in bowl
4. Add falafel and tabbouleh
5. Include cucumber and tomato
6. Drizzle with tahini sauce

fields.title: Thai Peanut Noodle Bowl
fields.description: Rice noodles with vegetables, tofu, and creamy peanut sauce.
fields.instructions:
1. Cook rice noodles
2. Stir-fry tofu until golden
3. Sauté vegetables
4. Make peanut sauce
5. Toss everything together
6. Garnish with peanuts and cilantro

fields.title: Chicken Burrito Bowl
fields.description: Tex-Mex bowl with seasoned chicken, rice, beans, and fresh toppings.
fields.instructions:
1. Cook cilantro lime rice
2. Season and grill chicken
3. Warm black beans
4. Prepare pico de gallo
5. Arrange all ingredients in bowl
6. Top with cheese, sour cream, and guacamole

fields.title: Spinach and Strawberry Salad
fields.description: Fresh salad with baby spinach, strawberries, goat cheese, and candied pecans.
fields.instructions:
1. Wash and dry baby spinach
2. Slice fresh strawberries
3. Crumble goat cheese
4. Toast pecans with honey
5. Make balsamic vinaigrette
6. Toss all ingredients together

fields.title: Egg Salad Sandwich
fields.description: Creamy egg salad made with Greek yogurt on whole grain bread with lettuce and tomato.
fields.instructions:
1. Hard boil eggs and cool
2. Mash eggs with Greek yogurt
3. Add diced celery and mustard
4. Season with salt and pepper
5. Toast whole grain bread
6. Assemble sandwich with lettuce and tomato
